tool.name: smalt check
tool.description: Determine number of reads in fastq(s) and if they are mate-pair

param.name: pInput1
param.label: Forward FASTQ file
param.help: Must have ASCII encoded quality scores

param.name: pInput2
param.label: Reverse FASTQ file
param.help: File format must match the Forward FASTQ file

param.name: mInput1
param.label: Forward FASTQ file
param.help: Must have ASCII encoded quality scores

param.name: mInput2
param.label: Reverse FASTQ file
param.help: File format must match the Forward FASTQ file

tool.help:
**What it does**
Check FASTA/FASTQ read files. If <mate_file> is specified, the reads are in pairs.
------
Please cite the website "http://www.sanger.ac.uk/resources/software/smalt/".
